counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were actively processing.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: TES EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which evaluation shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Alpha Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS alpha test.

counter.name: Sampler 1 Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which sampler 1 was bottlenecks.

counter.name: TES Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of evaluation shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: TES AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which evaluation shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: GS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of geometry shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: GS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which geometry shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: CS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which compute shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: VS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: TCS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which control shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: TES EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which evaluation shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: GS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which geometry shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: FS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which fragment shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: CS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which compute shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were stalled.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: TCS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which control shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: FS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which fragment shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: CS Duration
counter.description: Total Compute Shader GPU duration.
counter.equation: A 17 READ A 0 READ UMUL A 2 READ A 7 READ UADD A 12 READ UADD A 17 READ UADD A 22 READ UADD A 27 READ UADD UDIV A 18 READ A 1 READ UMUL A 3 READ A 8 READ UADD A 13 READ UADD A 18 READ UADD A 23 READ UADD A 28 READ UADD UDIV UADD $GpuTime UMUL $GpuCoreClocks $EuCoresTotalCount UMUL 1000 UMUL UDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of vertex shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: FS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of fragment shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: Sampler 0 Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which sampler 0 was busy.

counter.name: Sampler 1 Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which sampler 1 was busy.

counter.name: Samplers Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which samplers were busy.
counter.equation: B 0 READ B 1 READ UADD $GpuCoreClocks FDIV 2 FDIV 100 FMUL
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: TES Duration
counter.description: Total Evaluation Shader GPU duration.
counter.equation: A 12 READ A 0 READ UMUL A 2 READ A 7 READ UADD A 12 READ UADD A 17 READ UADD A 22 READ UADD A 27 READ UADD UDIV A 13 READ A 1 READ UMUL A 3 READ A 8 READ UADD A 13 READ UADD A 18 READ UADD A 23 READ UADD A 28 READ UADD UDIV UADD $GpuTime UMUL $GpuCoreClocks $EuCoresTotalCount UMUL 1000 UMUL UDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GTI Fixed Pipe Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between 3D Pipeline (Command Dispatch, Input Assembly and Stream Output) and GTI.

counter.name: GTI Read Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from GTI.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: CS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of compute shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: CS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which compute shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: Sampler 0 Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which sampler 0 was bottlenecks.

counter.name: GS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which geometry shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Sampler 0 Texels LOD0
counter.description: The total number of texels lookups in LOD0 in sampler 0 unit.

counter.name: Sampler 1 Texels LOD0
counter.description: The total number of texels lookups in LOD0 in sampler 1 unit.

counter.name: Sampler Texels LOD0
counter.description: The total number of texels lookups in LOD0 in all sampler units.

counter.name: GS Duration
counter.description: Total Geometry Shader GPU duration.
counter.equation: A 22 READ A 0 READ UMUL A 2 READ A 7 READ UADD A 12 READ UADD A 17 READ UADD A 22 READ UADD A 27 READ UADD UDIV A 23 READ A 1 READ UMUL A 3 READ A 8 READ UADD A 13 READ UADD A 18 READ UADD A 23 READ UADD A 28 READ UADD UDIV UADD $GpuTime UMUL $GpuCoreClocks $EuCoresTotalCount UMUL 1000 UMUL UDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: EU Idle
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were idle.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GTI Depth Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between depth caches and GTI.

counter.name: GTI Write Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written to GTI.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: FS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which fragment shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GTI L3 Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between L3 caches and GTI.

counter.name: VS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which vertex shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Samples Blended
counter.description: The total number of blended samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the GPU has being processing GPU commands.

counter.name: FS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which fragment shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: Early Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early depth test.

counter.name: TCS Duration
counter.description: Total Control Shader GPU duration.
counter.equation: A 7 READ A 0 READ UMUL A 2 READ A 7 READ UADD A 12 READ UADD A 17 READ UADD A 22 READ UADD A 27 READ UADD UDIV A 8 READ A 1 READ UMUL A 3 READ A 8 READ UADD A 13 READ UADD A 18 READ UADD A 23 READ UADD A 28 READ UADD UDIV UADD $GpuTime UMUL $GpuCoreClocks $EuCoresTotalCount UMUL 1000 UMUL UDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: TES AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which evaluation shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which geometry shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: TCS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of control shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: TCS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which control shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Samples Killed in FS
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels dropped in fragment shaders.

counter.name: Late Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS depth test.

counter.name: Sampler Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which samplers were bottlenecks.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview Indicate System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: TCS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which control shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: FS Duration
counter.description: Total Fragment Shader GPU duration.
counter.equation: A 27 READ A 0 READ UMUL A 2 READ A 7 READ UADD A 12 READ UADD A 17 READ UADD A 22 READ UADD A 27 READ UADD UDIV A 28 READ A 1 READ UMUL A 3 READ A 8 READ UADD A 13 READ UADD A 18 READ UADD A 23 READ UADD A 28 READ UADD UDIV UADD $GpuTime UMUL $GpuCoreClocks $EuCoresTotalCount UMUL 1000 UMUL UDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Early Hi-Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early hierarchical depth test.

counter.name: CS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which compute shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Late Stencil Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS stencil test.

counter.name: GTI RCC Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between render color caches and GTI.

counter.name: L3 Sampler Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between samplers and L3 caches.
counter.equation: B 6 READ B 7 READ UADD 2 UMUL $EuSlicesTotalCount UMUL 64 UMUL

counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which vertex shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: FS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which fragment shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GtiRccMemoryWrites
counter.description: The total number of GTI memory writes from Render Color Cache (Render Color Cache invalidations).

counter.name: TES EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which evaluation shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: VS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which vertex shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: TCS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which control shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the GPU has being processing GPU commands.

counter.name: FS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which fragment shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: Early Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early depth test.

counter.name: LLC GPU Write Accesses
counter.description: The total number of LLC cache lookups for write done from the GPU (32B writes).

counter.name: GS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which geometry shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: FS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which fragment shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: GtiStcMemoryWrites
counter.description: The total number of GTI memory writes from Stencil Cache.

counter.name: TES AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which evaluation shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which geometry shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: TCS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of control shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: TCS AVG Stall per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which control shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: TCS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which control shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: Samples Killed in FS
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels dropped in fragment shaders.

counter.name: Late Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS depth test.

counter.name: TCS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which control shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: FS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which fragment shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were stalled.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Early Hi-Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early hierarchical depth test.

counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: CS EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which compute shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which compute shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Late Stencil Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS stencil test.

counter.name: GtiSoMemoryWrites
counter.description: The total number of GTI memory writes from Stream Output.

counter.name: VS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which vertex shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: GtiRczMemoryWrites
counter.description: The total number of GTI memory writes from Render Depth Cache.

counter.name: CS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which compute shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Samples Written
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: GtiMemoryWrites
counter.description: The total number of GTI memory writes (64B each).

counter.name: VS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were actively processing.

counter.description: The percentage of time in which evaluation shaders were stalled on the EUs.
